headline: Can Cardinal Health’s Recent Performance Signal Stronger Growth Ahead in 2025?
summary: If you're wondering what to do with Cardinal Health stock right now, you're not alone. Investors everywhere are trying to decipher whether the recent moves in the stock signal a new era of growth or just a temporary shift in risk sentiment. Over the past year, Cardinal Health shares have surged over 37%, and since the year began they're up an impressive 25%. However, if you zoom out, the last month has seen a nearly 6% dip, reminding us that even strong performers face their share of...
